Specimen Type: Genomic DNA (extracted from patient sample, typically peripheral blood)
Purpose: To comprehensively detect mutations in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes for assessing hereditary breast and ovarian cancer risk.
Container: EDTA whole-blood tube (for DNA extraction) or equivalent DNA collection container
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermal cycler, NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina), Sanger sequencing setup (capillary electrophoresis), high-sensitivity DNA quantifier (e.g., Qubit), bioinformatics workstation/software
